attributes.action: allow the development of the East End Mosque and use it to promote harmony and greater inter-faith dialogue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We support the development of the East End Mosque and its potential to enhance greater understanding of the great religions. True Islam has to be presented to people to counter the demonisation pursued by the media-this project will begin that.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow the development of the East End Mosque and use it to promote harmony and greater inter-faith dialogue."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13311.asp

Prime Minister's Office
